name: Monster Truck Drag Race
description:
Monster Truck Drag Race is high speed drag simulator game.
If you like Drag, Race, Simulator Monster Truck Games try it NOW for FREE.

Features:

- Awesome 3D dirt tracks and stunt courses
- Modern turbo monster trucks with real suspension
- Monster vehicle tuning and customization
- More detailed and complex graphics and physics than ever
- 10+ ultra detailed vehicles to unlock and drive
- More than 8 amazing tracks to beat
- Game Services Leaderboards and Achievements
- Rocking sound tracks

DOWNLOAD AND DRIVE NOW!
